text:
As #COVID19 #vaccine becomes readily available.
@CDCgov @POTUS #Govenors, #schoolsuperintendents, should assign a week for all #Teachers in USA to get:
1st shot March 1-7, 2021
2nd shot April 1-7 2021
 
Open #schools safely in May 2021

Leadership and cooperation

Good idea?
#RT https://t.co/gCMXx0jgU3
